meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of lead chloride arsenate.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a shiny mimetite in the rock sample.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a vein of mimetite in the old mine.
meanings.sent3: The mimetite sparkled like tiny diamonds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The mimetite seemed to hold the secrets of the earth within its crystal structure.
meanings.sent5: The vivid green color of mimetite made it stand out among the other minerals.

meanings.sent1: She tried to mimetite the dance moves of her favorite singer.
meanings.sent2: The artist could mimetite the expressions of animals with great accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The parrot attempted to mimetite the sound of the ringing phone.
meanings.sent4: His ability to mimetite the voices of famous actors was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The comedian could mimetite the mannerisms of politicians in a hilarious way.
